entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
ISOLATED SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN SCATTERED SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
